comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly George Fisher Baker, banker and philanthropist. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Fisher_Baker Looks to be the same George Baker who was on the cover of Time on April 14, 1924. See www.coverbrowser.com/image/time/59-1.jpg

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Harvard Business School, one of the institutions benefiting from George Fisher Baker's philanthropy, has another picture that looks like the same man. See www.library.hbs.edu/hc/buildinghbs/george-baker.html
